Xfinity Flex

How might we bring premium X1 features to a cord-cutting customer base in order to serve them the best platform to find and discover all of their entertainment needs? An all-in-one premium streaming device that as of 2022 was in four million households.

Xfinity Music Week

Wouldn’t it be great to listen to your favorite songs on the best sounding speakers? Often times, those speakers are connected to the TV, more than likely in the living room.
